channel.title: Publications on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents

item.title: iFetch at CVPR
item.description: In online shopping applications, the daily insertion of new products requires an overwhelming annotation effort. Usually done by humans, it comes at a huge cost and yet generates high rates of noisy/missing labels that seriously hinder the effectiveness of CNNs in multi-label classification.

item.title: New Publication at ACM MM 2020
item.description: We are happy to announce that our recent publication is now available at ACM digital library. Title: Adaptive temporal triplet-loss for cross-modal embedding learning. Abstract: “There are many domains where the temporal dimension is critical to unveil how different modalities, such as images and texts, are correlated.
